Project Title: Branding Package for "Nourish Foods"

final.summary:
FREELANCE INDEPENDENT CONTRACTOR AGREEMENT ‚Äì Simplified Summary

1. Parties involved:
o Creative Canvas Studios, a partnership firm registered under the Indian Partnership
o For Creative Canvas Studios
o Mr. Irfan Khan
o Ms. Aisha Khan
2. Obligations of the Receiving Party:
o Keep the information in strict confidence and protect it like its own confidential data.
o Not share it with any third party without the written consent of the Disclosing Party.
o Use it only for the Purpose and nothing else.
o Share it only with employees, directors, advisors, or consultants who need to know, provided they also follow confidentiality obligations.
3. No rights or licenses (patents, copyrights, trademarks, or IP) are granted under this Agreement.
4. The Contractor agrees to provide graphic design services to the Client on a project basis.
5. The Contractor is solely responsible for paying her own income taxes and other statutory dues on the payments received from the Client.
6. Aisha Khan, freelance graphic designer, daughter of Mr.
7. All payments are subject to a deduction of tax at source (TDS) as per the applicable rates under the Income Tax Act, 1961.
8. Total Fee: A fixed fee of 75,000/- (Rupees Seventy-Five Thousand only), plus applicable GST.
9. All parties involved with COMPLETE names, titles, addresses, and relationships 2.
10. ALL dates, amounts, durations, financial details mentioned 3.
